chart.title: Share of the population using drinking water facilities
chart.citation: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024)

Share of the population using safely man.descriptionShort: Safely managed drinking water services are defined as an improved drinking water source that is located on premises, available when needed and free from faecal and priority chemical contamination.

Share of the population using only basic.descriptionShort: Basic drinking water services are defined as an improved drinking water source, provided collection time is not more than 30 minutes for a roundtrip including queuing.
